divs: sighting detailsi am dying to know if anyone else saw this and what it looked like to them the night of oct. 21 2012? my father and i were standing on his right across from the palace of auburn hills at approx. 9:30 pm and all of a sudden this huge glowing light\orb appeared in the sky not far from us. it literally looked at first like it was an airplane on fire because it appeared to be glowing and burning hot like fire. we soon realized that it was not an airplane because it continued to hover for a few minutes, got very bright, and then quickly dimmed until it was no longer visible, as if it took off and sped away in the other direction. did anyone else witness this??!!
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Auburn Hills
There were no other sightings in Auburn Hills on or around October 21st 2012
Summary: Red-orange glowing UFO sighted near Palace of Auburn Hills; was close, got very bright, and then quickly dimmed out of sight
